data.comment: The match is underway in Chester.
Goal kick for Chicago at Subaru Park.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Chicago at Subaru Park.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Chicago.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
In the minute 3, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to Chicago's area.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Chicago's Alvaro Medran gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Free kick Philadelphia.
In the minute 8, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Chicago drives forward and Ignacio Aliseda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Chicago to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Chicago.
Can Philadelphia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Chicago's half?
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Chicago's half.
In the minute 15, Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jack Elliott for Philadelphia has been booked by Guido Gonzales Jr and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 17, Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Philadelphia.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 20, Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the home team a throw-in.
Robert Beric gets his shot on target but fails to score for Chicago.
In the minute 22, Chicago are coming forward and Robert Beric gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 23, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Chicago's half.
Important block from the Chicago defence as Sergio Santos fires in a strike for Philadelphia.
Chicago needs to be cautious. Philadelphia have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
An attacking Philadelphia player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 28, Goal! Philadelphia take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Kacper Przybylko spot-kick..
Throw-in for Chicago in the half of Philadelphia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in Chicago territory.
In the minute 31, Philadelphia push forward at Subaru Park and Kacper Przybylko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Chicago defence.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
Jakob Glesnes (Philadelphia) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Free kick in a good position for Philadelphia!
Throw-in high up the field for Philadelphia in Chester.
In the minute 34, In Chester Philadelphia drive forward through Raymon Gaddis. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Philadelphia's Anthony Fontana is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 36, Chicago are down to 10 men after Francisco Calvo has been shown a red card.
Free kick Philadelphia.
Throw-in for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a Philadelphia throw-in in Chicago's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Chicago.
In the minute 41, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Philadelphia a goal kick.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Goal! Robert Beric (Chicago) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Djordje Mihailovic to set up the goal.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Chicago close to the penalty box.
At Subaru Park the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Chicago's Alvaro Medran gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Chicago.
The first half has been concluded at Subaru Park.
In the minute 45, At Subaru Park, Robert Beric has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
The home team have replaced Raymon Gaddis with Olivier Mbaizo. This is the first substitution made today by Jim Curtin.
In the minute 47, Chicago to take a throw-in in Philadelphia territory.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Anthony Fontana is booked for the home team.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 51, Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of Chicago.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of Chicago.
In the minute 52, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, Guido Gonzales Jr waits before resuming play because Przemyslaw Frankowski for Chicago is still down.
Chicago's Przemyslaw Frankowski is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
In the minute 57, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alvaro Medran (Chicago) gets a yellow card.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Chicago's half?
In the minute 59, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia make their second substitution with Ilsinho replacing Anthony Fontana.
In the minute 60, Jim Curtin is making the team's third substitution at Subaru Park with Cory Burke replacing Sergio Santos.
Can Chicago get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
The match at Subaru Park has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alvaro Medran, who is down injured.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Alvaro Medran is back on the pitch.
Philadelphia's Cory Burke scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
In the minute 65, Olivier Mbaizo with an assist there.
Free kick Philadelphia.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Philadelphia's Alejandro Bedoya has been booked in Chester.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards the away team a throw-in.
Kacper Przybylko for Philadelphia drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, Philadelphia pushes forward through Cory Burke, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bobby Shuttleworth is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Bobby Shuttleworth is back on his feet again.
Philadelphia's Cory Burke attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Chicago at Subaru Park.
In the minute 72, Raphael Wicky (Chicago) is making a second substitution, with Fabian Herbers replacing Ignacio Aliseda.
The away team have replaced Jonathan Bornstein with Miguel Navarro. This is the third substitution made today by Raphael Wicky.
Elliot Collier is replacing Boris Sekulic for Chicago at Subaru Park.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Chicago.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
In the minute 76, Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Free kick Chicago.
Robert Beric (Chicago) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 76, Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Andre Blake for Philadelphia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Raphael Wicky is making the team's fourth substitution at Subaru Park with Carlos Teran replacing Alvaro Medran.
In the minute 80, Andre Blake has recovered and rejoins the match in Chester.
Chicago awarded a free kick in their own half.
Chicago have been awarded a corner by Guido Gonzales Jr.
In the minute 82, Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago.
Philadelphia push upfield but Guido Gonzales Jr quickly pulls them for offside.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 85, In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Chicago in their own half.
Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Philadelphia in the half of Chicago.
Throw-in for Chicago in their own half.
Jim Curtin (Philadelphia) is making a fourth substitution, with Andrew Wooten replacing Kacper Przybylko.
In the minute 88, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Djordje Mihailovic (Chicago) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
Alejandro Bedoya is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 89, Joe Bendik (Philadelphia) has replaced the possibly injured Andre Blake.
Philadelphiaâ€™s Alejandro Bedoya is on his feet again at Subaru Park.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a free kick to Philadelphia just outside Chicago's area.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Chester.
In Chester Philadelphia attack through Jakob Glesnes. The finish is off target, however.
Guido Gonzales Jr awards Chicago a goal kick.
Free kick for Chicago in the half of Philadelphia.
Chicago's Djordje Mihailovic gets in a shot on goal at Subaru Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Chicago.
Chicago drive upfield and Gaston Gimenez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
Guido Gonzales Jr signals a throw-in for Chicago, close to Philadelphia's area.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Free kick for Chicago in their own half.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Ball safe as Chicago is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Philadelphia needs to be cautious. Chicago have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Chicago close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Chester.
Ball goes out of play for a Chicago goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
Ilsinho (Philadelphia) has received a yellow card from Guido Gonzales Jr.
